Html:
It worked fine till last month.. i haven't changed any settings.. Ports , certificate is fine.. but sill on the downstream servers the package filed sowing in red color
What could be the issue.. Please help me out.
Does it occurs with newly published package or already published package ?
This mean that downstream servers doesn't trust packages on upstream servers. check certificate on downstream servers.
But i haven't changed anything on down stream servers... And the certificate looks to be fine..

i have deleted and re-imported the certificate... now its working fine..
Still i don't know what was the issue, its the same certificate i imported...
Thanks for your support :)
